content: the misty days blanket is a versatile crochet blanket pattern written in 9 sizes from preemie to king this beginner-friendly design uses only slip_stitch half_double_crochet and double_crochet to create a beautiful textured fabric with a neat border perfect for crocheters of all levels this pattern makes a thoughtful handmade gift for babies weddings housewarmings or just for keeping cozy at home written in us and uk terms english only you ll receive two pdf files layout sunflower cottage crochet patterns are easy to follow with clear instructions sizing and gauge information stitch tutorials and all the important details laid out simply ❤ skill level easy no special stitches ❤ size options preemie 22 x 22″ security 14 x 17 baby blanket 30 x 35″ receiving 40 x 40″ crib 45 x 60″ throw 52 x 60″ double 90 x 104 queen 96 x 104 king 104 x 104 ❤ materials needed #4 weight yarn 5mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle optional stitch markers measuring tape ❤ format instant pdf download all sunflower cottage crochet patterns are tested by skilled artisans to ensure accuracy and readability you ll be able to relax and enjoy your project confident that you re on the right track
